name: S.H.E. (Zac E)
description:
S.H.E. is a procedural dungeon crawler where you explore the Ornare, a derelict space ship, and maneuver around a malevolent AI.

Made for PROCJAM 2020 and 7dfps 2020, with additional inspiration from A Game by it's Cover Jam 2016 (and this case in particular).

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Turn: Q and E
  • Left Hand: Left Click or L
  • Right Hand: Right Click or  P

Engine:  Unity

Image Editor:  Paint.net

Sound Effects: Mixkit
